clip.quote: Video can grow your business. It is the most amazing thing. And if you don't know how to make great video to grow your business, you're never too late.
clip.why_clipworthy: This moment emphasizes the transformative power of video content for business growth, encouraging agents to start regardless of their current skill level.
clip.suggested_hook: Think it's too late to start using video for your business? Think again!
